summary: This is a female Argonian CBBE Skin Texture replacer, as the vanilla texture had missing/blank/invisible areas.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Argonian CBBE Skin Texture
Author: Edhildil
11,26,2012
ver1



[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

This is a female Argonian CBBE Skin Texture replacer, as the vanilla texture had missing/blank/invisible areas. I made it from the vanilla texture. 

Body in screenshot compare is optional file from Edhildils Skimpy Clothing and Armor mod

[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]

Use this for any Caliente mod (CBBE armor, clothes, or body)
It is required that you have those kinds of mods to use this texture correctly.

USE THE LOW RES FILE if you are getting the pixelated purple vomit skin, or lower your display setting.

[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]

Unzip then copy/paste into your \\\\\\\"skyrim\\\\\\\" folder(without the quotes).
this should add the following files:

argonianfemalebody.dds
argonianfemalebody_msn.dds
argonianfemalebody_s.dds

into this folderpath:

Data\\\\\\\\textures\\\\\\\\actors\\\\\\\\character\\\\\\\\argonianfemale

[img]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/9233/uninstall.png[/img]

Delete these files:

argonianfemalebody.dds
argonianfemalebody_msn.dds
argonianfemalebody_s.dds

from this folder:

Data\\\\\\\\textures\\\\\\\\actors\\\\\\\\character\\\\\\\\argonianfemale

[img]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/9223/bugske.png[/img]

The seams are not 100% perfect as I \\\\\\\"eyeballed\\\\\\\" it in Gimp 2. 
In some cases its barely, and I mean barely, noticable, but its
a lot better than what I had and as I briefly looked for Argonian
textures on the Interwebs and found very little I went for it.

[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Bethesda for original textures
Edhildil for the texture rework  

Tools:
========================
Gimp 2
FOMM

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

Use at will, you do not need permission from me, this is for any and all whom
wish to use it, just give me proper credits if you use my work in your mod, cheers!

-E
author: Edhildil
